Sequence Information.Function: Has antimicrobial activity against most Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria, filamentous fungi and yeasts tested. Has trypanolytic effect on T.b.rhodesiense and limited hemolytic activity against bovine red blood cells.

Literature.Title: Epithelial innate immunity. A novel antimicrobial peptide with antiparasitic activity in the blood-sucking insect Stomoxys calcitrans.
Literature.Author: Brun R.,Vovelle F.,Hamilton J.V.,Munks R.J.L.,Boulanger N.

Literature.Title: Solution structures of stomoxyn and spinigerin, two insect antimicrobial peptides with an alpha-helical conformation.
Literature.Author: Vovelle F.,Bulet P.,Boulanger N.,Meudal H.,Landon C.
